div.div: Set off for evening walk using runtime on Apple Watch. I liked the starting screen showing distance, time and pace. However, I looked away and when I looked back the clock screen was back up. In order to get back to the widget, I had to push the crown and navigate back to the tiny app (impossible to do while walking fast). When I finished my walk, I pressed save and my information is no where to be seen. Guess it's back to my Garmin.

This an Amazing update, working very smooth. with very nice maps.
Is there any chance to support Microsoft Band, as well as Shoes?
Pace times are wildly erratic. Interface in iOS 8 doesn't fit iPhone 4s screen--start/stop buttons hard to access--have lost runs as a result. Going to look for something else.
Pace times are wildly inaccurate. Won't sync runs with DropBox--the only sync option. Interface in iOS 8 doesn't fit iPhone 4s screen--start/stop buttons hard to access.

Great running app, makes it really easy to track my progress in running. I love the update and the fact you can see lots of different data about your running habits! It's awesome to have all that information!

I've tried RunKeeper, Strava, and Runtastic in the past. This app is my favorite amongst these due to its simplicity and ease of use.I like that the app doesn't open up to using GPS right away. That annoys me about other apps if all I want to do is view data. I don't need GPS triggered when it's not needed.I don't want my fitness apps to be social and Runtime doesn't force any of that on you. You can share data, but you're never promoted to.Last favorite feature: unlock all features for a one time fee of $4.99. No monthly subscriptions to worry about.Two things I would like to see added is iCloud support for syncing rather than requiring manual syncing to Dropbox and HealthKit integration.

div.strong: Walktime for me, I'm not a runner

div.div: Longtime user, keeps getting better, looking forward to Health Kit integration.
Great update for iOS 8!

This app is really well done. It goes above and beyond other apps for runners by allowing me to group runs into different locations — like the park, my neighborhood, or my school—and better understand my performance and progress over time in the different locations.I also really enjoy how easy interval training is to set up. I would recommend Runtime to anyone looking to take advantage of the power of the iPhone to enhance their runs.
Worth a lot more than it costs.

Runtime is perfect for keeping a gorgeous visual record of your runs, storing them by location and with a heavy emphasis on the course you traverse. It's a great alternative to the heft and annoyances of Runkeeper and MapMyFitness.
Really like the detail of showing when I cross a street etc. but the one problem I have is it will not let me delete a certain run even though it verifies that I want to!
Just ran 8 miles, and all the app did is a straight line from my start and end points, with no information in the pace tab. Can't figure out what is wrong. So far it is a waste of money!
Nice little app. Simple. Easy to use. But, fatally, allows you to unknowingly erase all your saved tracks. Not a useful feature.
Nice little app. Simple. Easy to use. But, fatally, allows you to unknowingly erase all your saved tracks. Not a useful feature.
Great running app, makes it really easy to track my progress in running. I love being able to see the routes that I take and group different places together.
A great easy to use run tracking app. Let's me share my runs with my friends. Really nice graphics.
good!!!,I like !
Kept crashing - unusable. Deleted.
A great easy to use run tracking app. Let's me share my runs with my friends. Really nice graphics.

Yet another pedometer that doesn't work. How hard is it to measure a distance? Been using Runtime for several days and have yet to get anything like an complete, let alone accurate, read of simply how long my dog walk is. It looks a lot better than most others, but always fails either part way along my walk, giving me a partial maps of where I've been, or like today,....it starts off fine, and tells me I walked for 30 minutes...and have gone zero steps and 0.1 miles...huh??With no info how to make it work better, or way to contact the developer, I am going to ask for a refund.
Love the new app - perfect for running or walking. love the maps and reporting features. keeps all my favorite trails or runs together. easy to use and track my walks or runs for review

Before I had this app, I didn't know how far I was running. Now I know! The interface is intuitive and the transitions from the map thumbnails to full screen are incredible. Great app! A must have!! Someone should buy the developer a drink!!
I'm training for a half-marathon and this app is the perfect tool to keep track of my runs and help motivate me to keep going!
